name: Prison Break (studzy)
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING

it seems like the webgl build breaks when you go into settings

if there are any problems with the webgl build please notify me asap and then download one of the builds below to continue playing

have you ever wanted to break out or broke out of prison before?

no? well that was broad of me to ask.

the game

you've been wrongfully convicted and were sent to a prison set in a modern era, with the government overran by machines, it's time to take matters into your own hands and escape this dump.

it's up to you to decide if you do this as stealthy as possible, or commit a full on assault.

credits

shotgun acquire

smg shoot
